channel.title: Need help with this error
channel.description:
My server seems to crash pretty often, and when it does, it shows this error in my run.bat file.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.SpecDamg<client.java:657> at client.process<client.java:15314> at PlayerHandler.process<PlayerHandler.java:137> at server.main<server.java:56>[/code]
Can anyone help me out with this one? Also, if I need to show you any of the codes, I will.

item.title: Need help with this error
item.dc:creator: @Patrick_M_25 Patrick M 25
item.description:
@Patrick_M_25 wrote:

My server seems to crash pretty often, and when it does, it shows this error in my run.bat file.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.SpecDamg<client.java:657> at client.process<client.java:15314> at PlayerHandler.process<PlayerHandler.java:137> at server.main<server.java:56>

Can anyone help me out with this one? Also, if I need to show you any of the codes, I will.
